question: With reference to human sperm, match the List - I with List - II.
| List - I | List - II |
| 1 Head | p Filled with enzyme |
| 2 Acrosome | q Contains mitochondria |
| 3 Middle piece | r Sperm motility |
| 4 Tail | s Contains haploid nucleus |
explanation: Head (1) -> Contains haploid nucleus (s). Acrosome (2) -> Filled with enzyme (p). Middle piece (3) -> Contains mitochondria (q). Tail (4) -> Sperm motility (r).
